task.title: Viewing the history of a branches and files
task.shortdesc: At some point in the development cycle, you may want to see exactly when and by whom specific changes were introduced. The add-on lets you preview the history of the current branch or a modified file listed in the staging area.

step.cmd: To view the history of the entire branch, in the Git Staging view toolbar, click Show current branch history button.
To view the history for a specific file, right-click a staged or an unstaged file and select Show history.
To view the history for a specific file with line-by-line change highlighting, right-click a staged or an unstaged file and select Show blame.
